author: kou
msg: (Svn::CommitMailer#make_body): Show log message before change summary.

author: kou
msg: (svn_swig_rb_set_revision): Fix the way of converting Time object

author: gstein
msg: Get rid of the svn_wc__make_adm_thing() internal API, switching it to a
file-local function. Convert a number of calls to extend_with_adm_name()
(make_adm_subdir): ... this. useless params removed and the function was
streamlined to just creating subdirs in the admin area.
(svn_wc__check_killme): use svn_wc__adm_child(). avoid a stupid creation
of svn_string_t and just strcmp() directly

author: gstein
msg: Switch to directly creating the lock, rather than using the to-be-killed

author: stylesen
msg: Merge from 1.5.x branch to 1.5.x-issue2489 branch to bring it up-to-date
